thread.title: Dr. Oz
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Dr. Oz

author: Dr. Oz
title: Dr. Oz
text: I bought home and auto insurance through this company. So far they have always Quote: d best rates. Equally important (if not more), the agents were courteous and were willing to take the extra mile to help find the insurance that suits my needs. All agents I've interacted with so far have been excellent. Hope things remain that way...
